content: the cactus garden blanket captures the spirit of the american southwest inspired by the landscapes of the san juan mountains near durango colorado and the beautiful canyonlands mountains and mesas of the four corners area of the united states this blanket is worked in the mosaic crochet style inspired by tinna thórudóttir thorvaldsdóttir s beautiful havana afghan https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/havana-afghan-cal this blanket is designed for dk worsted or aran weight yarn that works well with a 5 mm hook lion brand mandala yarn and caron simply soft yarn are used in the sample each row is worked in only one color of yarn odd row are worked in yarn a lion brand mandala self-striping yarn in gnome and peacock in the large sample these row form the diamond pattern even row are worked in yarn b caron simply soft yarn in black in the large sample and form the background or main color the pattern is offered in 3 sizes a small afghan for a lap blanket or child s blanket 30 in by 60 in 76 cm by 152 cm medium 45 in by 60 in 114 by 152 cm and a large afghan to fit a twin or single bed 60 in by 90 in 152 cm by 229 cm the small blanket requires 1 180 yards 1 080 m of yarn a 844 yards 772 m of yarn b and 107 yards 98 m of yarn for the border the medium blanket requires 2 213 yards 1 941 m of yarn a 1 575 yards 1 440 m of yarn b and 107 yards 98 m of yarn for the border the large blanket requires 3 540 yards 3 240 m of yarn a 2 520 yards 2 304 m of yarn b and 160 yards 146 m for the border the pattern 60 includes a bonus mini size 23 5 by 23 5 inches 60 by 60 cm requires 450 yards 411 m of yarn a and 300 yards 274 m of yarn b this is an intermediate level pattern that requires chain slip_stitch single_crochet and double_crochet stitches us terms us and metric measurements given video tutorials are available on the pretty peaceful channel on youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucq_v3cp2scq5sobdrt6s8-a join the facebook group for this crochet-a-long pretty peaceful people for coloring pages to plan your blanket and more https //www facebook com/groups/492055481562505/ the baby blanket size of the cactus garden blanket is available as a pdf here https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cactus-garden-blanket the cactus garden pillow set pattern pdf is available here https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cactus-garden-pillow-set pattern
